title: YouTube Video Editor (Remote, Long-Term Opportunity)
job_overview:
We're expanding our team and seeking a highly skilled, reliable Video Editor to take charge of content for the Kevin Jubbal, MD YouTube channel! This a prime opportunity for a dedicated editor looking for a stable, long-term remote role.

What You'll Do:

- Edit high-quality, engaging YouTube videos (30 hours/week).
- Create compelling thumbnail drafts in Photoshop.
- Work collaboratively within a streamlined production workflow.

We Need Someone Who Is:

- Expert in Final Cut Pro or Adobe Premiere Pro.
- Strong with color correction/grading.
- Detail-oriented, proactive, and an excellent communicator.
- Equipped with a fast computer (4K capable) and high-speed internet.

Why Join Our Team?

- Long-term stability with a rapidly growing, impactful brand.
- Contribute to meaningful, educational content.
- Opportunity to grow your skills and refine your editing style.
- Clear expectations and a supportive remote environment.

Ready to be part of something big? If you're excited about YouTube, storytelling, and contributing to a channel with massive reach, we invite you to apply and share your incredible work!
